medical_history.chief_complaint: Fatigue and generalized weakness of 4-year duration.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's fatigue and generalized weakness began 4 years ago. Initially, symptoms were attributed to transaminitis and antihypertensive medications, but they progressively worsened and were now associated with atypical chest pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of hypertension. Bilateral intraocular lens implantation for premature bilateral cataract at age 18.
